title: The Moviegoer
description: Binx Bolling is the moviegoer-a New orleans man who lives for the bright, fleeting moments of celluloid fantas he experiences at the movies. But real life has a funny habit of butting in...and soon he's more involved than he'd like to be with a beauty who is drifting toward disaster during the Mardi Gras week that will change both their lives.
author: Walker Percy
